title: Killing Lincoln
writer: Erik Jendresen, Bill O'Reilly (based on the book by), Martin Dugard (book)
actors: Tom Hanks, Regen Wilson, Billy Campbell, Jesse Johnson
plot: Based on The New York Times best-selling novel, Killing Lincoln is the suspenseful, eye-opening story of the events surrounding the assassination of U.S. President Abraham Lincoln.
awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
name: Killing Lincoln
